WYNSPEARE CODING

Caroline Wynspeare Cessaro

About Me

After 10 years of Graphic Design and Event Planning experience, and 5 years owning Wynspeare Creative, I am now moving into the field of tech after realizing my love for coding.

A few years after my husband transitioned out of the Army, we co-founded Pathfinder - a web-based platform that aggregates first-hand accounts and reviews of resources for veterans. As we built out the platform, I realized how important coding skills were. As a result, I am now taking part in the Web Development Immersive Program at Code Platoon. I have found I thoroughly enjoy coding, especially the problem solving and data organization aspects and am excited to work in a new industry.

WE BELIEVE IN LEARNING NEW TECHNOLOGY

Caroline's background in design and familiarity with HTML and CSS led her to the tech world, she is now learning React and other frontend tools.
